title: Adjust CO2 chart series colors (Right lighter than Left) in chart and legend

requirements.summary: Ensure 'CO2 Right (%)' uses a lighter green than 'CO2 Left (%)' in the CO2 chart lines and matching legend swatches, consistently across light/dark modes.
acceptanceCriteria: In the CO2 chart, the 'CO2 Left (%)' line is a darker green than the 'CO2 Right (%)' line.
The legend line icon for 'CO2 Left (%)' uses the same darker green as the chart line.
The legend line icon for 'CO2 Right (%)' uses the same lighter green as the chart line.
The color relationship (Right lighter than Left) is consistent in both light mode and dark mode.

file_operations.description: Update the CO2 line series stroke/activeDot colors so 'co2Left' is explicitly mapped to the darker green token and 'co2Right' to the lighter green token, ensuring Recharts' legend swatches inherit the same colors from the series.
Adjust the CO2 chart color CSS variables for both :root and .dark so the 'Left' token is perceptibly darker than the 'Right' token in both themes (and keep the dashed CSV color unchanged).
